verses.verse: Then came <S%H5066>near<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and unto the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

and they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H5892>cities<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>, with the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof for our <S%H929>cattle<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, who were of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, and out of <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and out of <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> had out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are here <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>:

and they were for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>, who were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>; for theirs was the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7151>Kiriath-arba<s%>, which <S%H704>Arba<s%> was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, with the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof round about <S%H5439>it<s%>.

But the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, gave they to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%>, and <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H3492>Jattir<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H2473>Holon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,

and <S%H5871>Ain<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H3194>Juttah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> out of those <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H5960>Almon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, even the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, they had the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%>, and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H6911>Kibzaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H514>Elteke<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1667>Gath-rimmon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And out of <S%H4276>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1667>Gath-rimmon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were <S%H6235>ten<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, out of <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> they gave <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%>, and <S%H1203>Be-eshterah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H7191>Kishion<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1705>Daberath<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H5873>En-gannim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H4861>Mishal<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
Helkath <S%H2520><s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%>, and <S%H2576>Hammoth-dor<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7178>Kartan<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And unto the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7177>Kartah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
Dimnah <S%H1829><s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> with its <S%H3096>suburbs<s%>, and Jahaz with its suburbs,
Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> with its <S%H4158>suburbs<s%>, and Mephaath with its <S%H702>suburbs<s%>; four <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H7433>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%>, and <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> cities in <S%H5892>all<s%>.

All these were the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, even the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>; and their <S%H1486>lot<s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H272>midst<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.
These <S%H5892>cities<s%> were every <S%H5892>one<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5892>them<s%>: thus it was with all these cities.

So <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3427>it<s%>, and dwelt therein.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave them <S%H5117>rest<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, according to all that he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and there <S%H5975>stood<s%> not a <S%H376>man<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>; Jehovah <S%H5414>delivered<s%> all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

There <S%H5307>failed<s%> not <S%H1697>aught<s%> of any <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; all came to <S%H935>pass<s%>.
